name: MARGEVS
metaTitle: MARGEVS New Build Properties Pilar De La Horadada
metaDescription: Discover MARGEVS properties in Pilar De La Horadada. Exclusive new build homes at Rambla Beach II development.
heroHeadline: MARGEVS - Beachfront Living in Pilar De La Horadada
heroIntro:
MARGEVS is a forward-thinking property developer specializing in contemporary residential developments along the Costa Blanca. With a focus on quality construction and prime locations, MARGEVS brings modern living spaces to sought-after coastal communities. We're currently showcasing 1 exclusive property from their Rambla Beach II development, positioned in the charming seafront town of Pilar De La Horadada.

This development represents MARGEVS's commitment to creating vibrant communities where residents can enjoy Mediterranean coastal living with contemporary amenities. The Rambla Beach II project reflects careful urban planning and attention to detail, offering properties designed for both holiday retreats and permanent residences seeking authentic Spanish seaside charm.

aboutSection.title: About MARGEVS
aboutSection.content:
MARGEVS has established itself as a reliable developer in the Costa Blanca property market, with a reputation for delivering quality residential projects in premium locations. Their approach combines modern architecture with respect for local character, creating developments that enhance existing communities rather than overwhelm them.

The developer's portfolio reflects a strategic focus on accessible luxuryâ€”properties that offer genuine value without compromising on finishes or location. MARGEVS understands the importance of community planning and sustainable development, ensuring their projects benefit both residents and the broader neighborhoods in which they're located.

specializationSection.title: Development Focus
specializationSection.content:
MARGEVS concentrates their development efforts on the southern Costa Blanca, a region known for its authentic Spanish towns and relaxed Mediterranean atmosphere. Pilar De La Horadada, their current focus area, offers residents direct access to pristine beaches and a genuine local community that maintains its character despite growing international interest.

The Rambla Beach II development exemplifies MARGEVS's specialization in creating cohesive residential projects that integrate seamlessly with established coastal towns. Rather than pursuing scale, the developer prioritizes thoughtful design and appropriate density, ensuring new properties enhance rather than diminish the area's appeal.

qualitySection.title: Quality & Specifications
features: Contemporary architectural design with Mediterranean influences
Direct or near-proximity access to beach and seafront amenities
Thoughtful integration with existing local infrastructure
Professional project management and transparent timelines
Warranty and aftercare support for residents
qualitySection.content: MARGEVS maintains rigorous standards throughout the construction process, from initial design through final handover. Each property incorporates quality finishes selected for both durability and aesthetic appeal, ensuring homes that remain attractive and functional for decades. The developer works with established suppliers and licensed contractors, prioritizing reliability and craftsmanship over cutting corners.

reasons.title: Prime Coastal Locations
reasons.description: MARGEVS developments are strategically positioned in established communities with proven appeal and genuine character.

reasons.title: Transparent Development
reasons.description: Clear communication, realistic timelines, and professional project management mean buyers know what to expect.

reasons.title: Lasting Value
reasons.description: Properties that maintain and appreciate well due to thoughtful design, quality construction, and desirable locations.

faqs.question: Where are MARGEVS properties located?
faqs.answer: MARGEVS currently develops properties in Pilar De La Horadada on the southern Costa Blanca, with their Rambla Beach II development offering contemporary homes in this established coastal community.

faqs.question: What types of properties does MARGEVS build?
faqs.answer: MARGEVS specializes in residential properties including apartments, townhouses, and villas, each designed to suit different lifestyle preferences while maintaining consistent quality standards.

faqs.question: How can I view MARGEVS properties?
faqs.answer: We showcase exclusive MARGEVS listings on our website. Contact our agency team to arrange viewings or receive detailed information about available properties and upcoming releases.

conclusion: MARGEVS represents a thoughtful approach to coastal property development, combining genuine value with quality construction and prime locations. Explore their current offering through our exclusive listings and discover why discerning buyers choose their homes for both lifestyle and investment potential.
